catentdesc.name: StyleHome Modern Rimmed 3 Piece Sofa Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: 3 piece sofa set with a very modern design.
catentdesc.longdescription: A sofa set with a modern design from StyleHome that is perfect for you living room. Made from 100% leather and memory foam its as comfortable as it looks.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Modern Plain Single Large Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sophisticated modern sofa design.
catentdesc.longdescription: This large sofa from StyleHome looks and feels very sophisticated with its plain design and hard memory foam. Its neither soft nor hard so that your guests don't sag in neither feel they are sitting on a counter.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome InOffice Double Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: InOffice sofas are made for the typical office environment.
catentdesc.longdescription: StyleHome presents a sofa that is appropriate for the office and also your home. This is the perfect sofa for the waiting lounge outside the CEO's office or a small living room with minimalist style.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome InOffice Single Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: InOffice sofas are made for the typical office environment.
catentdesc.longdescription: StyleHome presents a sofa that is appropriate for the office and also your home. This is the perfect sofa for the waiting lounge outside the CEO's office or a small living room with minimalist style.

catentdesc.name: Supreme GiantsCorner Sofa Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: 2 piece sofa set with shams for a cozy living room.
catentdesc.longdescription: A very snug sofa set with a 3 seat sofa and a divan. Ideal for placing along corner of your large living room. Watch TV while enjoying the company of your friends and family in this giant sofa set.

catentdesc.name: Supreme LoungeStyle Double Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: A long cozy double sofa for lounges.
catentdesc.longdescription: This smooth synthetic is perfect for lounge environment, and is stain proof. It as easy as wiping stain off it with a wipe, thus reducing maintenance. It is built tough so that it does not tear or break easily.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Loom Large Artists Table
catentdesc.shortdescription: A large low study table with a single drawer.
catentdesc.longdescription: A large study table appropriate for artists, architects etc. With a flat low design, and a large sleek drawer to keep drawing utensils this is a table for working artists. With a well curved wood finish, it is ideal for both home and office environment.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Origami Japanese Dining Table
catentdesc.shortdescription: A large Oakwood Japanese dining table.
catentdesc.longdescription: Japanese dining table made of sturdy Oakwood, with a traditional design. Design is also appropriate for a centre table in a large living room.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Modern Steelet Single Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: A modern single sofa with leather seat and steel legs.
catentdesc.longdescription: Cozy single sofa made of leather and a boxy design meant for both home and office environments. Can also be used as a reading chair as its memory keeps you from back ache from long periods of seating.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Rocoz Double Legged Leaning chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: Comfortable leaning chair with a double leg design.
catentdesc.longdescription: Very comfortable leaning chair with 2 legs, so the chairs bends to your weight and leans back to give you the most comfortable possible position to take a short nap, read a novel or just relax.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome UltraCozy Single Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: Very cozy short design single sofa.
catentdesc.longdescription: The sofa has a short back rest but a long width to get lazy while sitting lazy. With a matte fabric finish and a soft center, this is the perfect sofa to indulge someone to get lazy and stay back.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome UltraCozy Large Sofa
catentdesc.shortdescription: Very cozy short design Large sofa.
catentdesc.longdescription: The sofa has a short back rest but a long width to get lazy while sitting lazy. With a matte fabric finish and a soft center, this is the perfect sofa to indulge someone to get lazy and stay back.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge WorkMan Working Table
catentdesc.shortdescription: Working table made to take damage.
catentdesc.longdescription: A very tough table where you can do all sorts of heavy machinery works such as sawing or drilling. Sturdy legs to keep the table from shaking and thick top to stop it from breaking.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Large Double Door Mahogany Wardrobe
catentdesc.shortdescription: Beautiful Mahogany wardrobe with drawers and hanger cabinet.
catentdesc.longdescription: Mahogany wardrobe to beautify your room and to stowe away clothes in an organized way. Inside there are 3 large drawers and hanger compartment so you can easily organize your clothes.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Kcloth Multi Compartment Wardrobe
catentdesc.shortdescription: A multiple compartment wardrobe.
catentdesc.longdescription: Now you can efficiently stow away clothes without the worry of losing track of your clothes. With 1 hanger compartment, 3 shelf compartment and 3 drawers you can organize your clothes however you want.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Large Mahogany Wardrobe
catentdesc.shortdescription: A very large beautifully designed wardrobe with 2 drawers and 3 compartments
catentdesc.longdescription: Very large mahogany wardrobe that will keep all your clothes and make your room look beautiful. The wardrobe has 2 drawers and 2 hanger compartments and 1 shelf compartment. The striped mahogany makes the wardrobe a piece of art.

catentdesc.name: SleepyHead Storytime Double Bed
catentdesc.shortdescription: Kids low double bed made of wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: A low design double bed for kids. The design has a simple head board and short legs so kids don't have a hard time getting onto the bed. Made of light weight wood the design is very appealing in both girls and boys room.

catentdesc.name: SleepyHead Elegent Queen Bed
catentdesc.shortdescription: Elegent queen bed for your master bedroom.
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegantly designed queen bed for romantic couples. Low design with a large head board, and made of sturdy hard wood. Perfectly polished bed, will perfect suit any master bedroom.

catentdesc.name: SleepyHead LowKey Double Bed
catentdesc.shortdescription: Very low design double bed.
catentdesc.longdescription: Made to make you feel as close to the ground as possible, this low key bed design is for people who love bedding on the floor. Large, crafted sideboards give the bed a contemporary look.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Clodit Chest of drawer
catentdesc.shortdescription: Medium width chest of Drawer with 3 drawers.
catentdesc.longdescription: A simple wood design chest of drawer with 3 large drawers. Peg legs to keep it off the floor and easily move around. The sspace-saving slide on rails drawers for smooth opening and closing.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Lodraw Chest of drawer
catentdesc.shortdescription: Small width 3 drawer chest of drawer.
catentdesc.longdescription: Inexpensive but functional chest of drawer from Stonehenge, when you just need a chest of drawer to store your clothes nicely, without any fancy wood work or a fancy price.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Large Ash wood Chest of drawer
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large 4 drawer chest of drawer made of ash wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: Made of dark ash wood, this chest of drawer is as hardy as it looks. 4 large drawers fitted with smooth railed grid for easy opening and closing. Ash wood cannot be easily scratched or cracked, the chest of drawer will keep looking new for ages.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Intree Chest of drawer
catentdesc.shortdescription: Chest of drawer with 4 drawer made of Birch wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: This is a simple design chest of drawer from StyleHome made from Birch wood. If you want something that is not expensive but will last for a long time, this is the perfect chest of drawer.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Comfy Dining chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: A dining chair with foam sit and back rest.
catentdesc.longdescription: Dining chair from StyleHome made for utmost comfort. Foam covered with fabric on back rest and the sit, this looks great and feels great in around any dining table.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Rigg Dining chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: A rigid dining chair with steel legs and plastic surface.
catentdesc.longdescription: Rigg dining chair from StyleHome is affordable, stylish and durable. Sturdy build will keep the chair from breaking under a lot of weight. And curvy design adorns your dining room with a modern look.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Woodek Dining chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: A classic dining chair made entirely of wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: For people who prefer a classic look to their home, this is a dining chair made to suit a nobleman's mansion from the last century or today's home with a classic look. It is sturdy and durable as well.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Cheper Dining chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dining chair made of plastic.
catentdesc.longdescription: A durable plastic dining chair from Stonehenge. If you don't want to spend too much money on dining chair but you want your dining room to still look out, these are the perfect chairs.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Offtone Office Chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: Office chair designed for comfort,
catentdesc.longdescription: Offtone is meant for offices, but it is not rigid or uncomfortable unlike other office chairs. It can be placed inside the office or the waiting room. This chair will make the customers comfortable while waiting in any office environment.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Fil-e Office Chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple Office chair with a great design.
catentdesc.longdescription: An inexpensive office chair that looks splendid in any room! Made with steel and fabric, this is a great chair if you plan to buy a lot of chair without breaking your account. It can also look great in a modern style home.

catentdesc.name: Stongehenge Bolds Dining chair
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dining chair with a bold design.
catentdesc.longdescription: A different type of dining chair made with wood surface on steel legs. It has a very modern design and will look amazing in any type of dining room.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Booktop Study table
catentdesc.shortdescription: A medium sized study table made of fir wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: A table made from fir wood with a simple design. The table might be inexpensive, but it is as strong as any other work table. Easy to assemble packaging.

catentdesc.name: Stonehenge Bookelf Study table
catentdesc.shortdescription: A medium study table made of pine wood.
catentdesc.longdescription: A classic study table made from pine wood which can also be used as a work table. Extremely hard table with a thick top that cannot be scratched or broken easily. For the people who likes to put all their stuff on the table.

catentdesc.name: StyleHome Sturdy Study table
catentdesc.shortdescription: Very sturdy study table made of cedar.
catentdesc.longdescription: Stylish study table from StyleHome, and also extremely durable and strong. This table is very hard to break, even if your kids started jumping on top, nothing will happen. Cedar wood does not absorb moisture, does not rot nor wear, this table will last you through ages.
